name: Block Cat Puzzle
description:
Block Cat Puzzle is an innovative puzzle game. We have added many strategic elements to the classic puzzle gameplay, such as puzzle pieces can be rotated, mirrored, overlapped and cloned, which makes each puzzle very challenging and interesting.

In addition, Block Cat Puzzle uses a Hand-drawn style in its artistic expression, which is different from most other puzzles in the app store. The Hand-drawn style will bring players a more comfortable visual experience.

How to play Block Cat Puzzle?
Drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and try to make them all fit.

How many Puzzles are there?
80+ Puzzles waiting for you to challenge! It's not a lot, but it's high quality!
Puzzles difficulty has been repeatedly optimized to ensure the player's game experience.

Do I need to pay anything to play this game?
The game is completely free to play, but you can buy hints in the game to help you solve harder puzzles.
